article:
The following is a partial list of rogue security software, most of which can be
grouped into families. These are functionally identical versions of the same
program repackaged as successive new products by the same vendor.



* Advanced Cleaner [http://www.precisesecurity.com/blogs/2007/08/09/advanced-
  cleaner/ Precise Security - Advanced Cleaner]
*  AV Security 2012

* AKM Antivirus 2010 Pro [http://www.virusremovalguru.com/?p=6140 Virus
  Removal Guru - AKM Antivirus 2010 Pro]

  Warrior - AlfaCleaner]
* Alpha AntiVirus [http://www.spyware-review.net/remove-alpha-antivirus-removal-
  instructions/ Alpha AntiVirus - Spyware-Review]
* ANG Antivirus (knock-off of AVG Anti-virus) [http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/virus-removal/remove-ang-
  antivirus-09 BleepingComputer.com - ANG Antivirus]
* Antimalware Doctor [http://www.spyware-review.net/remove-antimalware-
  doctor/ Remove Antimalware Doctor - Spyware-Review]

  Remove Antimalware Pro]
